title: Ron Wyden
extract: Ronald Lee Wyden is an American politician serving as the senior United States Senator for Oregon since 1996. A member of the Democratic Party, he previously served in the United States House of Representatives from 1981 until 1996. He is the current dean of Oregon's congressional delegation.
extract_html: Ronald Lee Wyden is an American politician serving as the senior United States Senator for Oregon since 1996.
